[D-Day](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/D-Day_(military_term)) occured on June 6, 1944.

* It was an amphibious invastion of Normandy, France from Great Britain.
* Several forces from the Allies fought against the Axis, namely Germany.
* This resulted with the successful opening of a second front in the European Theatre of World War II.
